The more you take away from me the large: What has branches and leaves but no bark?
I have both a head and a tail but no legs. What am I?
Hit me hard I'll crack. But you'll never stop me from staring back.
I am where yesterday comes after today and tomorrow's in the middle.
I can run but not walk. Wherever I go thought follows close behind.
What has neither nails nor bones yet has four fingers and a thumb?
I can fill an entire room or one heart. Others may have me but I can’t get shared.
What gets harder to catch the faster you run?
I can be cracked told made and played.  What am I?
